DOC.brief_summary: This protocol is for a series of comparative effectiveness and safety analyses within periodically updated cohorts of patients initiating linagliptin, other DPP-4 inhibitors, and other oral hypoglycemic medications, followed longitudinally for the occurrence of a variety of health outcomes. The primary analysis will be conducted among patients without prior within-class medication use.
DOC.brief_title: Active Surveillance Research Program for the Assessment of the Safety and the Effectiveness of Linagliptin
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criteria: A dispensing of an oral hypoglycemic medication A diagnosis of type 2 diabetes mellitus (T2DM) Exclusion criteria: less than 18 years old missing or ambiguous age or sex information at least one diagnosis of type 1 diabetes mellitus less than 6 months enrolment in the database preceding the date of the first dispensing secondary diabetes history of cancer endstage renal disease (ESRD) HIV organ transplant
